m_szDocTitle: Nissan LEAF Named Cleanest Production Vehicle In US | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: Nissan LEAF Named Cleanest Production Vehicle In US Originally published on EV Obsession . The 2014 edition of the Nissan LEAF is the cleanest production vehicle in the whole of the US, according to the Automotive Science Group (ASG). The rankings figure in the entire wheel-to-well lifetime environmental impact of the cars studied — accounting for everything from the materials used in the construction of the vehicle, to the fuel/energy used run it, to its end-of-life processing. More than 1300 vehicles, across nine different categories, were included in the rankings — all needed to feature at
